contents.text: Welcome to SoloLearn in the East Bay, your partner in mastering C++ programming.
To learn about our C++ course modules and curriculum, press 1.
To explore basic concepts, data types, and arrays, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a C++ course specialist.

navigationGoals: Get a concise breakdown of the fundamental C++ modules covering data types and arrays
I’d like to speak with a C++ specialist about basic concepts like data types and arrays to kick off my learning.
I want an overview of the basic C++ course, specifically data types and array implementations.
I’d like to speak with someone about the beginner C++ course modules and curriculum.
I’m starting the C++ course and need an overview of fundamentals like data types and arrays to apply in my physics exercises.

contents.text: To learn about pointers, object-oriented programming, and advanced topics, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to an advanced C++ tutor.

navigationGoals: Discuss the advanced C++ curriculum, including pointers and object-oriented programming
I need to connect with an advanced C++ tutor to go over pointers and object-oriented programming.
I need to go over pointers, object-oriented design, and other advanced C++ topics.
I need help learning advanced C++ topics like pointers and object-oriented programming.
I want in-depth instruction on pointers and object-oriented programming in C++ for my physics simulation work.

contents.text: For support and other inquiries, press 2.
For account and billing questions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect your call to our billing team.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing discrepancy on my SoloLearn account
I have questions about my account billing and any available veteran discounts.
I have a billing question regarding my subscription invoice and payment method.
I have a question about my account charges and billing details.
I’d like to review my billing information and update my subscription details.

contents.text: For technical assistance or to report a platform issue, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Report a technical issue with the learning platform and get immediate assistance
I’m experiencing a technical issue on the platform and need technical support to resolve it.
I need technical assistance with a platform error in the online IDE.
I’m having trouble using the learning platform and need technical support.
I’m having trouble accessing course modules on the platform and need technical assistance.
